fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Collect a player's Taxes during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you collect a player's taxes during the day, they may choose to either accept or deny this. If accepted, the target's exact role will be sent to a random player of an opposing faction (in case of neutrals with no opponents, it will be a random player). If denied, though the IRS Agent won't be informed, the IRS Agent must kill them to win the game now.
- When rolled, the IRS Agent is also autorolled. This may not roll in role lists where the Tax Collector and IRS Agent may not exist together.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Attempt to collect the taxes of all living players.
